name: King.com Ltd.
goal: King is a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, with people all around the world playing one or more of our games. King has game studios and offices in Europe, Asia and the US, including in Stockholm, Malmo, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Malta and Bucharest.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
- Innovation
- Jobs and growth
- Digital Single Market
- Intellectual property rights
- Consumer rights
- Digital content
- E-commerce
- Data protection
